title: Dark Illustrations: Sketches in Blood
description: When a boy named Mischa with the power to see auras meets Adrian, a stoic youth with the power to manipulate the very fabric of fate, it spells trouble for some higher beings, but someone in particular is after them...and they don't even know it. (Shounen ai, gore, violence, theology and very lightly implied sexual scenes)Status: Incomplete/DiscontinuedLast update: 01/02/2007Word count: approx. 429,063
author: Xandra
